ticket_comments.comment: <p>Hi Costantin hope you are having a great weekend!No need to reply today. I saw you made a new update on themeforest but i dont find the changelog what is it about?</p><p>Made some improvements on my website on portfolio if you check the work items i hope you like how they appear.</p><p>At the moment everything seems perfect but i noticed one last thing! </p><p>The fix you made for the transition when we change pagesits like reloading page second time i mean when you click on a page and the white color goes up as the first part of transition its fine after it makes something like a reload so teh page appear smoothly, i can see that on my cookie banner on mobile if you check! Its not something serious or anything but is there a way to not do that i think also it will load the page faster, or as in the first part that white color goes up isnt there a gsap animation for the white color to go back down and reveal the content? That would be much more creative! </p><p>Giving an idea! </p><p>Thanks for eveything extremelly satisfied with his theme. </p>
<p>Hi i also see you fixed the logo mobile glitch you are amazing thanks and have a great weekend. </p>

<p>Thanks you are massive, website is super, one last thing i noticed try to open it from your mobile. </p><p>In the homepage when we scroll down you see that the sticky menu appears and dissapears? It should only appear when scrolling up right? Is this a bug? Cause its a bit annoying. </p><p><br></p><p>-------------------------------</p><p>And another minor thing that i dont really care if can be fixed is that in homepage i used an element (dynamic motion) that was from the dark layout homepage so at this section when you scroll up it brings the other sticky menu can this bring also my default sticky menu ? </p><p>I dont care its very minor. </p>

<p>Hi Constantin check also this happens on demo also </p><p>--&gt;Also a new issue i noticed in contact page whatever you put in email and other fields you cant send message always displaying this error The e-mail address entered is invalid. It does that also at the demo after the animation update maybe?</p><p>Oh thanks for fast fix on mobile glitch also you are amazing ! <br></p>

<p>I think its ok now? Website is live. maybe it was cause propagation did not complete? You see any errors from your side?</p><p>-----------</p><p>It would be amazing if you could fix the transitions as you told in your next update it will be a big plus for the theme! Cause now its very shard how they appear.</p><p>Also i noticed in mobile in inside pages not in homepage when first loads the Y logo is bigger and becomes smaller is this fixable somehow ? Or its from the loading time of the js and css so we cant do anything?</p><p>Thanks team. I love the creativity you put on this one and not many bugs or issues. </p>
<p>I think the mixed content errors are ok now the only thing remaining is the menu that loses black color when you go to homepage from another page liek i described below! </p>

<p>Hi thanks for fast reply i did already better search replace if you see but the errors appear still weird? </p><p>Also can you check the issue with themenu dissapearign like changing color from black to white? </p><p>You can see that if you click portfolio from homepage and then from portfolio you click again homepage. </p><p><br></p><p>Thanks. </p>
<p>Hi sorry i disabled it you can take a look! </p>

<p>Hello team after i prepared my website and changed domains etc i have some issues on some things. </p><p>1)Firstly if you open the homepage you will see that the logo animation is happeing on the left instead of the right side normally.<br></p><p>2)Also if you right click and inspect you will see some error what are those? Are they needed to be resolved?</p><p>3)In homepage where the services are how i can make the astronaut video play instead of image like in your demo ?</p><p>4)Sometimes when you are in another page and you click on logo to go to homepage th emenu doesnt show its like its changing color from black. Check it.</p><p><br></p><p>---------------------------- </p><p>Also an idea! When you click to go in a page like portfolio the transition is a bit shard i mean its nice where the screen animation goes upward as white but then page appears sharply you could also make the page going down after and the content appearing smoothly will be super. </p><p><br></p><p>Login url youruniquewebsite/wp-admin</p><p>testwolf </p><p>VAfVZD9Ty*53kIVwhgkXlpKy<br></p>
<p>pouvez vous  me  faire  un retour  ?</p>
<p>bonjour  je  ne  peux  pas  charger  les  plugins  les  liens  sur  le  theme ne  fonctionne  pas  pouvez  vous me  les  fournirs  merci </p>
<p>it also drops the resolution and makes it look low res as seen in the screenshots i posted</p>

<p>The image is vertically centered to fit the screen..</p>
<p>So this is normal that it appears cut off. </p>
<p>I just used an image that is 2000px by 1500px and it still coming out like this</p>
<p>Could you this as a plugin for the theme? Then, let people just upload the fonts directly?</p>

<p>Is there any way to use a font thats not on google or adobe?<br></p><p><br></p><p>This one - <a href="https://www.fontspace.com/malum-illegitimi-font-f115800" rel="nofollow">https://www.fontspace.com/malum-illegitimi-font-f115800</a></p>
<p>But the fonts in the theme aren't typekit or google? They're punktype &amp; another danger?</p>

<p>can you add that font requests to this theme too?</p>

open-tickets.ticket_title: I give Up...I want a refund

ticket_comments.comment:
<p></p><p>It is extremely distastful that a theme that cost nearly $100 has so many issues which i have been battling for more than 1 week. Even though before buying the theme i alerted you guys about an issue which shouldnt even be a issue.."menu not showing on mobile devices"</p>
<p>I should have taken this as a red flag to aviod this theme but i had hope which is no more with my tight deadline</p>
<p>Thank you Constantin!</p><p>One last thing, where can I find the Related Products code to make it show products from the same category?</p>
<p>Yes, please do as needed.</p>

<p>You're right, I refreshed the permalinks.</p><p>So the search term "beatles" should return all the products in this page "<a href="https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/the-beatles/" rel="nofollow">https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/the-beatles/</a>" and also those that contain the work beatles in the description or title.</p>

<p>Hello!</p><p>I've disabled the plugin "WP Extended Search". The search no longer loads endlessly, but it wont return any results, only sometimes, and not all :\</p><p>The issues I found.</p><p>1. The artist pages no longer work, they return 404 (e.g <a href="https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/terell-stafford/" rel="nofollow">https://vinylparadise.gr/artist/the-beatles/</a><br>2. Search wont no longer find search terms in the body</p><p><br></p>

<p>Please try the following :</p><p>Όνομα χρήστη FTP: support@vinylparadise.gr<br>Διακομιστής FTP: ftp.vinylparadise.gr<br>Θύρα FTPS ρητά &amp; FTP:  21<br></p><p>Password: <strong>reUo3o+@tHE]</strong><br></p>

<p>OK, I will remove the previous filter and optimize the new one.</p>
<p>Talk to you soon</p>

<p>Unfortunately yes, the client wants to include the SKU and the Label.. which I'm sure it's going to make it slower :P</p><p>Username FTP: maria@vinylparadise.gr<br>Server FTP: ftp.vinylparadise.gr<br>Port:  21</p><p>Password: reUo3o+@tHE]<br></p>

<p>Sorry, I forgot you have no access to the website.</p><p><a href="https://vinylparadise.gr/wp-admin" rel="nofollow">https://vinylparadise.gr/wp-admin</a><br></p><p><strong>user: </strong>support<br></p><p><strong>pass:</strong> 7@(&amp;sZ3EjT*#cRt@3R#(4K)e</p>

<p>You can see in this video: <a href="https://go.screenpal.com/watch/cTew1NniGnE" rel="nofollow">https://go.screenpal.com/watch/cTew1NniGnE</a></p><p>It loads indefinitely, I never got results. :\</p><p></p>

<p>I've installed WP Super cache in case it helped but still nothing.. </p><p>If you make a search it works for you? For example "beatles". For me it just keeps loading and nothing happens :(</p><p></p>
<p>Hello Constantin,</p><p>It's still extremely slow :\ And the website is on a semi-dedicated server.</p><p>Any cache plugin that you can recommend? What could be the issue for it being so slow?</p>

<p>Hi Maria,</p>
<p>Sorry for he delay I will get back to you ASAP</p>

<p>OK, I will optimize the search query today and get back to you.</p>
<p>Talk to you soon!</p>
<p>Yes I have :\</p>
<p>Did you installed the new version of Vonzot I provided?</p>
<p>Hey Constantin,</p><p>I've installed the child theme but the search is either too slow or not working :\</p>
<p>Here are the child theme files. Let me know if you need anything else.</p><p>Thanks!</p>
<p>Hello Constantin!</p><p>Any news on this? </p><p>p.s. I'm guessing you found my not so perfect code in the functions.php file :P</p><p></p>

<p>Hello!</p><p>I've created some WooCommerce custom taxonomies per client request. So for example you can view all records associated with a specific artist. </p><p>But I'd like the artist name to also be searchable and return all records with this artist name. <strong>For example</strong> when someone searches "<em>beatles</em>" it should return all records containing the word beatles, whether as the <strong>artist term</strong>, <strong>product name</strong>, or <strong>product description</strong>. </p><p>As it is now it won't return Records containing the word "beatles" if it's an Artist taxonomy term.</p><p>I hope I'm not confusing you :)</p><p>I'm transferring 80$ now through PayPal. Could you by any chance send me an invoice? I have a Greek VAT ID. Let me know!</p><p>Thanks!</p>

<p>Hello Constantin,</p><p>I'm trying to achieve the first one. Make the Artist custom taxonomy terms to be searchable in the WordPress/WooCommerce search results. I've already tried using some code snippets in the fuctions.php file but they don't seem to work correctly. I've also tried making SKU and a couple more taxonomies searchable. </p><p>Do you need access to the website? I've sent you logins before but let me know if you need them again :)</p><p>Maria</p>

<p>Hello!<br></p><p>I was wondering if you could help with getting the Artist Custom Taxonomy to work with the search results. </p><p>Is this something you could work on and could you send me a quote please?</p><p>I tried using the WP Extended Search plugin but it doesn't seem to work with the theme. :</p><p>Thank you!<br></p><p>Maria</p><p><br></p>

<p>Hi Constantin</p><p>I have tested the Poize theme on another of my sites and it seems ok, its isolated to my commercial website. I have uploaded an earlier version of the website to the staging site - same issue, which is concerning. I have rolled back the theme and reinstalled the plug in. No change. The WP admin tools are working fine (obviously). I have changed theme's on the site and the site comes up, so other themes are fine for the site.</p><p>Happy to provide you wp /  ftp access if you can assist in diagnosing? Please advise how I have provide these to you (obvs not in a public forum).<br></p><p>Thank you<br><br></p>

<p>Hello.</p><p>My site was working at the start of last week and sometime during the week it stopped loading and is now the white screen of death. I have diagnosed that the plug-in at fault is the Wolf Care plugin (v 2.0.32). When it is enabled it is WSoD. When it is disabled the site is up / not loading correctly. <br></p><p>I have confirmed theme (1.0.41) and WP (6.7.2) at the latest versions. Could you please assist?</p>

<p>It's working now, it was because the shop page was using Elementor.</p><p>Thank you.</p><p>I will try using other filters as yours aren't really usable as filters, but just as links.</p>
<p>Hi Constantin</p><p>It's the same with shop. The page doesn't follow the width as the other pages.</p>
<p>Hi Constantin</p><p>Sorry, the site is working again.</p><p>I have Sidebar left in the Shop tab.</p>

<p>I can’t access your site at the moment, but make sure the layout isn’t set to “Fullwidth” in the Customizer &gt; Shop tab. </p>
<p>I hope it will help.</p>
<p>Okay, thanks.</p><p>Do you have an idea why the left-sidebar page goes fullwidth, when it's my shop page?</p>
<p>Yes, it seems that the price filter widget only works in the WooCommerce pages but not when the products are displayed via an Elementor widget, in an Elementor page.</p>

<p>When i look at your own example: <a href="https://preview.wolfthemes.store/elsass/shop/left-sidebar/" rel="nofollow">https://preview.wolfthemes.store/elsass/shop/left-sidebar/</a></p><p>You use elementor.</p><p>But if i use elementor, i can't use filters, is that what your'e saying?</p>

<p>Hi Constantin</p><p><br></p><p>I will change the name of the page, when it works.</p><p>How do i get the design of left-sidebar page to keep the content width, it's like it doesn't follow the design rules.</p><p><br></p><p>Okay, thank for clarifying that.</p>
<p>Hi, the url is correct.</p><p>If i put a price widget, it will not work, will you please try to add one with the login i gave you?</p>

<p>Hi Constantin</p><p><br></p><p>It didn't work in the default shop page too.</p><p>I think i will have to put some filters from another plugin on the sidebar.</p><p>Are there any way already build in, in your theme, to put category filters etc into the sidebar?</p><p>Filters which filter on the list of products, and doesn't send one over to the category page when clicked, but filters the existing list, without refreshing the page.</p>

<p>Hi</p>
<p>If i set the shop-page to one of the other layout, for example left-sidebar, it still uses the standard shop-page layout, how can i use a layout like left-sidebar on the shop-page?</p><p><br></p><p>Edit: i think i got this one fixed, i could not delete the shop page and set left-sidebar as the new shop-page.</p>
<p>Sorry, i didn't mention. Right now, i'm trying with the Price filter widget.</p><p>I can add text, headings etc. but not filters.</p>

<p>And can you tell me how i add new filters to the widgets, nothing happens when i add new widgets to shop/blog sidebar.</p><p><a href="https://dev.uptime.dk/tapastid.dk/wp-admin/widgets.php" rel="nofollow">https://dev.uptime.dk/tapastid.dk/wp-admin/widgets.php</a><br></p>

<p>Hi, can you see why it fails on import media when using the import demo?</p><p><br></p><p><a href="https://dev.uptime.dk/tapastid.dk/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/log_file_2025-03-26__14-43-17.txt" rel="nofollow">https://dev.uptime.dk/tapastid.dk/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/log_file_2025-03-26__14-43-17.txt</a><br></p><p><br></p><p>Login are <a href="https://dev.uptime.dk/tapastid.dk/wp-admin/" rel="nofollow">https://dev.uptime.dk/tapastid.dk/wp-admin/</a></p><p>Username: wolff</p><p>Password: #y@jXYq!QmZlprijfV#cWEZG</p>

ticket_comments.comment: <p>Thank you for your answer,</p><p>I really would like to add this patreon link.</p><p>When you say offer, that is mean this is include in support ? </p>

<p>Hi,</p><ol><li>We would like to add a PATREON social media icon and link in the footer. Normally we would add or remove via the content block (icon), or personalizing panel (link). </li><li>Moreover we would like to put forward one product (like CD) in the shop, how to classify order, how to "highlight" a product in order to see it appears in the main page?</li></ol><p>Thank you,</p>

<p>Eigentlich war die Frage, ob Sie mir das Theme erneut installieren und aktivieren würden, wenn ich die Worpress Seite neu aufsetze. Ich hatte über das Theme, das Angebot gebucht, das mir das Template installiert wird. Ich weiß nicht ob das über Sie lief oder jemand anderes. Ich hatte da einen bestimmten Betrag gezahlt, das jemand das übernimmt, da ich das Theme selbst nicht installiert bekommen habe.</p>

<p>Unfortunately, I’m unable to assist with matters outside my scope, such as server settings or hosting services. However, if you decide to switch to SiteGround, I’d be happy to re-do the installation for you at no extra cost. Thanks!</p>
<p>Leider kann ich bei Themen außerhalb meines Aufgabenbereichs, wie z. B. Servereinstellungen oder Hosting-Services, nicht weiterhelfen. Falls Sie sich jedoch für einen Wechsel zu SiteGround entscheiden, übernehme ich die Neuinstallation gerne kostenlos. Vielen Dank!</p>

<p>Ich habe mit meinem Anbieter telefoniert und er sagte mir, das alle Einstellungen auf maximum gestellt sind.</p><p>Wie gesagt, bei meinen anderen Webseiten, habe ich keine Probleme. Anscheinend nur bei diesem.</p>

<p>Ich habe bereits alle Plugins deaktiviert und auch gelöscht um zu prüfen ob irgendein Plugin die Schnelligkeit beeinflusst. Leider ohne Erfolg. Auch ohne meine zusätzlichen Plugins brauchte das Dashboard genauso lange zum laden. <br></p><p>Sollen wir versuchen, ob es wieder funktioniert, wenn ich die Website mit Wordpress komplett neu anlege? Ich habe ja dafür bezahlt, das Sie mir das Template installieren, würde Sie es aus Kulanz vielleicht nochmal installieren &amp; aktivieren? Ich weiß echt nicht, was ich noch versuchen soll.</p>
<p>Hallo..</p><p>Ich habe gerade mit meinem Hosting-Anbieter telefoniert und er hat mir versichert, das ich die im Link stehenden Mindestanforderungen erfüllt werden.</p>
<p>Hey.. Ja ich hätte gerne Hilfe.</p>

<p>Hallo,</p><p>ich habe auch schon öfters versucht in Erfahrung zu bringen, wieso das Dashboard auf WordPress immer lange brauch zum laden, ich muss immer ca. 18 Sekunden warten, bis die Seite einen neuen Reiter lädt. Können Sie mir sagen, woran das liegt? Ich habe mehrere Websites die ich betreue, wo das laden gar kein Problem ist. Ich brauch da unbedingt Hilfe.</p>

ticket_comments.comment: <p>Hello dear WolfThemes Team,</p><p>I bought the theme Poize today and need it urgently. The import demo data does not work, neither manually via zip file (XML) nor automatically via the function on your theme. this is of course very annoying and I need it urgently. That's why I offer support.<br></p><p><br></p><p>Best regards, Farzad</p>
